title: Optimized the selection process of weighted random loadbalabce using binary search
body:
Optimized the selection process of the RandomLoadBalance class weighed loadbalance using binary search

## What is the purpose of the change

Improve the speed of weighted random load balancing, the time complexity is reduced from O(n) to O(lgn).

## Algorithm Description
Assuming weights=[1,2,3,4,5], we first calculate the prefix sum, weightsSum=[1,3,6,10,15]. Obviously it is ordered. Next we generate a 1-15 equal probability random number idx, if
        idx in [1] return 0
        idx in [2, 3] return 1
        idx in [4, 6] return 2
        idx in [7, 10] return 3
        idx in [11, 15] return 4
This problem is transformed into inserting the random number idx into the ordered array weightsSum, returning the index position it should be inserted or where it appears. Obviously we can use the binary search method to optimize, here I use the Arrays class. binarySearch function.

## Brief changelog

XXXXX
